<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List of platers available</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/registry"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns list of available PLATER instances.An entry from this list can be a prefix to route requests to specific PLATER backend

## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

object
